rules.natural: If an investigation report is filed for the case, then forensic analysis has been completed for the evidence.
Whenever unauthorized access is detected in the system, a data exfiltration attempt occurs on the database.
Either unauthorized access is detected in the system, or a privilege escalation attempt occurs on the user account.
In the event that a privilege escalation attempt occurs on the user account, incident response is completed by the team.
If an emergency patch is required for the software, a security update is applied to the application.
Provided that a security update is applied to the application, a system reboot is required for the server.
Whenever a compliance audit is scheduled for the organization, a regulatory breach is notified to the authorities.
Either public disclosure is issued for the incident, or it is not the case that legal action is initiated by the company.
A press release is published for the event, or public disclosure is not issued for the incident.

Business continuity is activated for the plan, or if neither a phishing attack targets the email system nor a vulnerability is exploited on the server, then normal operations are not resumed for the business.
Either critical functionality is affected in the services, or essential services are maintained in the operations.
Whenever essential services are maintained in the operations, business continuity is not activated for the plan.
Provided that an executive decision is pending with the management, emergency funding is not approved for the budget.

An executive decision is pending with the management, or if it is not the case that critical functionality being affected in the services implies business continuity is not activated for the plan, then disaster recovery is executed for the protocol.
If a phishing attack targets the email system, then whenever malware is detected on the workstation, patient data is compromised in the database.
Under the condition that an external audit is commissioned with the firm, a third-party consultant is hired for the expert.
Should intrusion prevention be activated on the firewall, patient data is compromised in the database.
Provided that access controls are modified for the permissions, authentication is enhanced for the system.
Whenever authentication is enhanced for the system, security protocol is updated for the policy.
If a vulnerability is exploited on the server, then under the condition that malware is detected on the workstation, patient data is compromised in the database.
In the event that a security alert is triggered in the SIEM, either a phishing attack targets the email system or a vulnerability is exploited on the server.
Either isolation protocol is activated for the infected device, or quarantine procedure is executed on the malicious file.

Should quarantine procedure be executed on the malicious file, then under the condition that neither backup restore is initiated for the storage nor incident response is completed by the team, the incident is not contained within the network.
If it is not the case that a data exfiltration attempt on the database implies incident response is completed by the team, then an emergency patch is required for the software.
In the event that it is not the case that malware detected on the workstation implies intrusion prevention is activated on the firewall, access controls are modified for the permissions.
Under the condition that it is not the case that malware detected on the workstation implies intrusion prevention is activated on the firewall, security protocol is not updated for the policy.

Provided that it is not the case that critical functionality being affected in the services implies business continuity is not activated for the plan, disaster recovery is not executed for the protocol.
Whenever it is not the case that an executive decision pending with the management implies emergency funding is approved for the budget, an external audit is commissioned with the firm.
Should neither a phishing attack target the email system nor a vulnerability be exploited on the server, then normal operations are resumed for the business.
Under the condition that neither backup restore is initiated for the storage nor incident response is completed by the team, the incident is contained within the network.

Provided that it is not the case that isolation protocol activated for the infected device implies that neither backup restore initiated for the storage nor incident response completed by the team leads to the incident not being contained within the network, an investigation report is filed for the case.

Under the condition that it is not the case that isolation protocol activated for the infected device implies that neither backup restore initiated for the storage nor incident response completed by the team leads to the incident not being contained within the network, forensic analysis is not completed for the evidence.

If it is not the case that it is not the case that incident response not completed by the team implies patient data is compromised in the database leads to a compliance audit being scheduled for the organization, then legal action is initiated by the company.
Under the condition that incident response is not completed by the team, malware is detected on the workstation.
